Title: Hamilton Conservation Authority Open Data Hub
Author: Hamilton Conservation Authority
Abstract:
Data from Hamilton and other Ontario Conservation Authorities, the City of Hamilton, and the Province of Ontario.

  • Boundaries
  • Conservation lands
  • Elevation
  • Flood, forecasting & warning
  • Groundwater
  • Hydrology
  • Infrastructure
  • Monitoring and reporting
  • Natural heritage
  • Source water protection

Additional information and resources are available through the Hamilton Conservation Authority website.
